dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A directed citation graph where nodes represent articles and edges represent citations between articles. It includes bag-of-words feature vectors for each article.
dcterms:title: Cora-ML

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A directed citation graph similar to Cora-ML, where nodes represent articles and edges represent citations. It also includes bag-of-words feature vectors for each article.
dcterms:title: Cite-seer

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A directed Wikipedia page link graph where nodes represent web pages and edges represent directed links from one page to another.
dcterms:title: Chameleon

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A directed Wikipedia page link graph similar to Chameleon, where nodes represent web pages and edges represent directed links.
dcterms:title: Squirrel

dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A directed Wikipedia page link graph where nodes represent web pages and edges represent directed links, similar to Chameleon and Squirrel.
dcterms:title: Crocodile
